project_descr: Water Governance Programme for Arab States (WGP-AS)

outputs.output_descr:
The programme aims to improve the effective use and management of scarce water resources in Arab countries, taking into account the environmental, economic, social and gender dimensions. It aims at supporting the achievements of the MDG 7 particularly with respect to improved water supply and sanitation, by promoting an integrated approach to water resources management in the Arab Region. 
It offers technical and policy support, capacity development, and seed funding for activities in the areas of 1) Integrated Water Resources Management; 2) Local management of water resources, water supply a
donor_name: THE MANUFACTURER,MARKETER, AND DISTRIBUTOR OF NONALCOHOLIC BEVERAGE CONCENTRATES AND SYRUPS
